text: You're standing in front of Evil Corp. HQ, the base of a massive company secretly planning to take over the world. The CEO is on the top floor, preparing to launch nukes in one hour. Each floor is guarded in an increasingly convoluted and dangerous way.

choices.text: Infiltrate the building disguised as a janitor

text: You successfully bypassed the security and reached the CEO's office, just in time to stop him. The world is safe.
You find a hidden blueprint of their next scheme.
You discover a secret meeting location.
You uncover a plot to overthrow the kingdom.

choices.text: Report your findings to the king

text: You uncover the full extent of the conspiracy and help thwart it.
The plotters capture you, but a brave knight saves you at the last moment.
The king thanks you for your service and promotes you in his court.
The conspirators recognize you and flee.
You chase after the conspirators and catch up to them just as they're about to enter a hidden underground lair. You confront them, but they manage to escape by using an intricate network of tunnels.

You demand answers from the conspirators, but their fear gets the better of them and they slip away into the shadows. As you stand there alone in the moonlit alleyway, you can't help but feel a sense of unease about what they were planning.
Backup arrives just as you radio for assistance. Together, you apprehend the conspirators before they can carry out their plan.
No clues are found, but your instincts tell you something is amiss.

choices.text: Ask for help from another character

text: You discover a hidden door behind the bookshelf.
Another character finds clues that lead you to the antagonist's hideout.
When you return, you find the place ransacked but no one is around. You hear a distant siren.
Their next scheme is revealed to be an elaborate heist.
You successfully bypassed the security and entered the vault, only to find it empty.

choices.text: Search for clues about where the valuables might be
Contact your associates to help you search

text: You find a secret room behind one of the walls, containing the valuables.
The clues lead you to an underground warehouse where the valuables are being held.
Your associates manage to locate and retrieve the valuables.
A skilled hacker joins your team but demands a large cut of the profits.
The team agrees to the hacker's terms and works together successfully, splitting profits.
Tensions rise as the team refuses the hacker's demands. The hacker leaves and the mission fails.
After some back-and-forth negotiation, the team reaches a fair agreement with the skilled hacker and all members contribute to the success of the mission.
The bribed guard leads you straight into the vault undisturbed.

You find yourself in the middle of a battle between two rival factions. You must choose a side.

You form partnerships that lead to groundbreaking advancements in your field.
The loyalty of your community ensures long-term success.

You uncover cherished memories and items, feeling a sense of nostalgia.

As you dig deeper into the mysterious events, you discover an ancient artifact that holds secrets to your family's past.

text: You find an ancient artifact that grants you unimaginable power.

The figure in front of you stops and looks at you with anger in its eyes. It turns out to be the owner of the house.
The figure explains that you have trespassed onto their property. They demand you leave immediately.
The figure agrees to your request and allows you to explore further. You find valuable clues that lead you closer to solving the mystery.
An argument ensues, but eventually the figure tires of it and lets you stay. However, they keep a close eye on you throughout your exploration.
You sneak away without drawing more attention to yourself. As you leave, you notice something odd about the figure's behavior that could be significant later.
You explain the situation, and the owner calms down realizing it was a misunderstanding. They let you stay.

choices.text: Ask for help from a friend

text: You discover that the misunderstanding was caused by a misplaced object, and you manage to resolve it. The owner thanks you.
Your friend arrives in time to diffuse the situation, and everyone is grateful for your quick thinking. You become known as a problem solver around town.
As you tiptoe out of the store, you notice a note on the door with instructions for how to contact the real owner. You follow these instructions and resolve the issue.
As you run away, the owner shouts after you to call the police.
The police arrive just in time to catch the thief.
You find a hidden room where you can safely wait for the authorities.
After hours of running, you finally lose your pursuer.
You were caught before reaching the top floor. You are now imprisoned for life.
You manage to escape and make it out of the prison, but are immediately recaptured.
You successfully break free and flee the prison.

choices.text: Follow the river out of town

text: You return to the prison only to be recaptured.
You successfully escape and make it out of the prison.
Your captors give you special privileges for being cooperative, but keep you locked up nonetheless.
The riot is quelled by guards, but not before you manage to slip away into the chaos.
The river leads you to an abandoned cabin in the woods, where you find shelter and safety.

choices.text: Cross the river and continue on foot
Set up camp by the river

text: You find a hidden journal inside the cabin, revealing that it was once home to a group of travelers who were trapped here during a storm. The journal also contains clues about how they survived until help arrived.

As you trek through the forest, you come across an old trail leading deeper into the woods. Following this path leads you to a hidden waterfall and natural hot springs where you can rest and recuperate before continuing your journey.

While setting up camp by the river, you notice that there are strange markings on some of the rocks nearby. Investigating these further reveals an ancient map leading to a long-lost treasure buried deep within the forest.
The stranger directs you towards a hidden path that leads you away from danger.

choices.text: Ignore the stranger and continue on your own path
Stay where you are and wait for help

text: You follow the stranger through the hidden path, and they lead you to a secret cave with valuable treasures.

Your captors grow to trust you, leading them to let you go.

text: You successfully sneak away while your captors are distracted.

text: You follow the prophecy's instructions, leading you to a hidden temple where you find an artifact that grants you great power. You become a hero in this world.

Ignoring the prophecy leads to unexpected challenges. You must rely on your instincts and wits to overcome obstacles that arise along the journey. In the end, you forge your own path and create a new legend in this world.

text: You successfully escape through a secret passage, continuing your adventure elsewhere.

text: The chest opens to reveal a glittering treasure.
The glittering gems catch your eye and you can't resist taking a closer look. As you examine them, you notice one gem is slightly different from the others.
You quickly stuff the treasure into your backpack, but as soon as it's out of sight, a trap door slams shut behind you, trapping you in this room!

You manage to escape with the treasure but are pursued by angry guards.

text: You stumble upon an ancient artifact, shedding light on your surroundings.

You reach a clearing where an ambulance is parked, and its lights are flashing. The paramedics hurry to help someone who has fallen.
You learn that the person they're helping is a fellow adventurer who tripped and injured their ankle. They thank you for your concern, and you continue on your way.
Inside the ambulance, you find a first aid kit which proves useful later in the game when one of your friends gets hurt.
As you walk further down the path, you come across another clearing where a group of bandits is holding someone hostage. You must decide how to handle this situation.
You take a detour through the woods, avoiding any potential danger from the sirens. You come across a hidden waterfall that you decide to explore further.
You discover an ancient cave behind the waterfall containing valuable artifacts.
